featured.text: He saw a man with a hole in the leg of his trousers and 29 realized what Californians 30 for the rough work they were doing—good, strong trousers! 21.

definition.zh_def: 一種覆蓋下半身的衣物，通常有兩條腿的設計。
definition.en_def: An article of clothing that covers the lower body, typically with two legs.
definition.example: He wore a pair of blue trousers to the meeting.
